senselogic.sitevision.api.search

Interface SearchFieldUtil

  • Deprecated. 
    use the typed methods in SearchHit instead when extracting values from a search result.

    @Deprecated
public interface SearchFieldUtil
    Utility class for converting String values extracted from search fields.

    Note! SearchHit has - as of Sitevision 3.0 - several typed getField methods that you would typically instead of this interface when you want to get "non-String" values! More information about field values/types

    Since:
    Sitevision 2.6.2, 2.7_06
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren
    See Also:
    SearchHit.getBooleanField(String), SearchHit.getDateField(String), SearchHit.getFloatField(String), SearchHit.getLongField(String)

      • dateFieldToDate

        Date dateFieldToDate(String aDateFieldValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the Date for a string field that contains a date value generated via Lucene's DateTools class.
        Parameters:
        aDateFieldValue - the String that should be converted to a Date
        Returns:
        aDateFieldValue as Date, or null if indeterminable.

        aDateFieldValue - the String that should be converted to a Calendar
        Returns:
        aDateFieldValue as Calendar, or null if indeterminable.

      • localeFieldToLocale

        Locale localeFieldToLocale(String aLocaleFieldValue)
        Deprecated. use LocaleUtil.getLocaleByString(String) instead
        Returns the Locale for a string field that contains a locale-based value that contains language ("en") or language and country ("en_US").

        A toString() on a english american locale returns the String "en_US", but to create a locale from that string you can NOT just create it by doing: new Locale("en_US"). You must split language (en) and country (US) since the proper way of creating the Locale is: new Locale("en", "US"). Language must be lowercased and country must be uppercased. This method will handle that (i.e. aLocaleFieldValue == "EN_us" -> new Locale("en", "US")).

        Note! This method does NOT handle variants!

        Parameters:
        aLocaleFieldValue - a String containing a language - or a language and country, separated with underscrore.
        Returns:
        a Locale matching aLocaleFieldValue, returns null if indeterminable (e.g aLocaleFieldValue is null)

      • intFieldToInt

        Integer intFieldToInt(String anIntFieldValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the Integer for a string field that contains a integer value generated via Lucene's NumberTools (i.e. long) class.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        anIntFieldValue as Integer, or null if indeterminable.
        Since:
        Sitevision 2.6.2, 2.7.2

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
